name: What is the Thinker Thinking?
description: If the sleep of the mind gives rise to monsters, what gives rise to the wakefulness of the mind? I visualised searching for an idea. The whole person participates in it. The body is in the form of beams, the activity of the brain is in the form of the finest particles.  Rodin's The Thinker, he was originally the Poet, he also Dante.  Music: Karlheinz Stockhausen - Kontrapunkte.
